title: Drought - effect on PL and real wage

content.question: Assume that an economy is currently in long-run equilibrium and the short-run aggregate supply curve is upward sloping. An adverse supply shock, such as a drought, will most likely cause which of the following to the economy in the short run?

choices.label: A decrease in the price level and a decrease in the nominal wage
A decrease in the price level and an increase in the nominal wage
An increase in the price level and an increase in the nominal wage
An increase in the price level and an increase in the real wage
An increase in the price level and a decrease in the real wage

content.answer: An increase in the price level and a decrease in the real wage

topic.text: 3.6: Changes in the AD-AS Model in the Short Run

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
